column1: quote

“Your comfort zone is a place where you keep yourself in a self-illusion and nothing can grow there but your potentiality can grow only when you can think and grow out of that zone.” ― Rashedur Ryan Rahman
“Do youfor youbecause of you!” ― Margarita Sekulova, Affirmations: A Guide to Manifest Better Life
“You know, there is a thin line between hope and confidence. What separates the two is rationality.” ― Abhaidev, The Influencer: Speed Must Have a Limit
“Know what you want and reach out eagerly for it.” ― Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of Wisdom: Great mind

“Courage is the starting point of everything good. To love another is to automatically feed the fire of courage. We cannot be humiliated when we are fighting for someone or something we love. We will not give up when we are fighting for loved ones. As we evolve, our loved ones extend out from our family to include all of humanity. Courage and confidence will grow over the years with practice and self-awareness. We are never alone. God will help us. Such is the courage which gains respect from others. More importantly, we gain respect for ourselves.” ― Donna Goddard, The Love of Devotion
“Have the STRENGTH to say “no” to the status quo. Have the WILL to listen to the deepest desires of your heart.Have the COURAGE to ACT on and live out your intent.” ― Richie Norton
“The most important life hymn: I’m not history repeated. I’m part of the new shift. I’m not afraid to proclaim I am God's greatest gift.” ― Ayura Ayira, Nuclear Harlot

“People love to say, “You gotta fake it till you make it.” But this implies that the fake you is someone better than who you inherently are, and this is simply not the truth. Let me say this loud and clear: the person you imagine yourself to be in the very best and most powerful moments of your life, is the authentic you. And in truth, I imagine you’re probably much more amazing even than that.” ― Richie Norton
“Get outside your comfort zone. Stretch beyond your norm and try new things.” ― Susan C. Young, The Art of Being: 8 Ways to Optimize Your Presence & Essence for Positive Impact

“Embrace change and practice flexibility. It will make you more agile in adapting to new people and situations.” ― Susan C. Young, The Art of Being: 8 Ways to Optimize Your Presence & Essence for Positive Impact

“If you want to appear more confident—speak slowly, articulately, clearly, and deliberately. Communicating with clarity will not only help you build more confidence in yourself, but it will inspire respect from others.” ― Susan C. Young, The Art of Being: 8 Ways to Optimize Your Presence & Essence for Positive Impact
“Believe in yourself, and you’ll be amazed at what you can do.You’ll then realize that the stories of being happy and alone are magical and true!” ― Menorca Chaturvedi, It Ebbs and It Flows
“Dare we ever lose confidence in the one who is to our left, our right, in front, or to our rear in battle.” ― Adam Davis
“You look at us as pests when in fact we just saved you another time.” ― Kaylee Stepkoski, Ever: The Alliance

“No diversion can prevent Jesus from making haste to come to your rescue. He is telling us to trust Him. Stop worrying whether He is too busy or distracted to save us from our dilemmas, heartaches, and struggles because He is helping others. He is also demonstrating the limitless nature of his power.” ― Sandra E. Jackson, Daily Sprinkles of Wisdom : Biblically Based Devotions
“Tailoring approaches for inspiring students to excel academically despite personal challenges works wonders.” ― Asuni LadyZeal

“The Best Four adversities, experiences, and challenges that can foster student achievement are those that trigger an obsession about their future, excitement about life, confidence to lead others, and inspiration to excel despite troubles.” ― Asuni LadyZeal

“Many are secure as human beings and insecure in their spiritual selves So if you are at times feeling insecure about life, know that it is better to be nervous upon this plane of operation than to be nervous on the inner plane of perfection” ― Natasha Rendell, Wisdom’s Fragrance: Insights that link us to the source of life
“Under valuing yourself is a lack of confidence. Overvaluing yourself is over-confidence.” ― Garima Soni - words world
“Even the halo carries a hollow But only angels know how to wear it as a crown.” ― Ritu Negi, Ethereal
“Your steps never have to be doubted” ― Stephen Veylor, The Mental Health: You Are the Doctor of Your Mind

“(...) here’s the thing about pretending to have all the answers: it’s exhausting, it’s lonely, and—surprise, surprise—it’s holding you back from your greatest potential. Your worth isn't determined by a flawless facade but by your resilience, adaptability, and willingness to be genuinely human.” ― Tempest Jemison, How to Break Free from Imposter Syndrome: A Hilarious Journey from Self-Doubt to Self-Love: A Quick, No-BS Guide to Stop Overthinking, Overcome ... Your Life With Fun Exercises and Extra Giggle

“When you believe in yourself, others will follow suit. Conversely, if you doubt yourself, you can’t expect others to have faith in you.” ― Frank Sonnenberg, Values to Live By: Know What Matters Most and Let It Be Your Guide
“You don't need permission. You need vision to build yourself.” ― Avijeet Das
“Becoming negligent of one’s health, eventually gets in the way of how one rationalizes their decisions with clarity and confidence.” ― Sasha Laghonh
“Confidence is not about being in the spotlight; it’s about shining from within.” ― Frank Sonnenberg, Values to Live By: Know What Matters Most and Let It Be Your Guide

“This story is for  anyone who has ever doubted themselves because of their outward appearance or their imperfect talents;  anyone who has hit rock bottom and does not know how to get back up again;  anyone who has faced loss and loneliness; anyone who never gave up on their faith and resilience amidst unstable circumstances; or  anyone who desires to experience the warmth of sisterhood.” ― Kotoba Clan, Moon Face Witch
“Success doesn’t come to you—you go to it. Hard work today builds the results you’ll celebrate tomorrow.” ― Preet Singh, Big ideas. Small books

“A confident woman learns to conquer her cognitive distortions. She does not let her mind run amok. She recognizes that she is not her past. She is not her future. She is today. She is not a victim. She is empowered and wise.”Excerpt From: Sarah Voldeng. “The Art of an Enlightened Woman.” Apple Books.” ― Sarah Voldeng, The Art of an Enlightened Woman: A Manifesto

“Help others. Helping others gives you a sense of value and worth. Sometimes, we fall into the limitations of the mind, but by shifting the focus away from ourselves and onto others, we find meaning. Being selfless is a powerful tool to help grow your own confidence and self-esteem.”Excerpt From: Sarah Voldeng. “The Art of an Enlightened Woman.” Apple Books.” ― Sarah Voldeng, The Art of an Enlightened Woman: A Manifesto

“Moth, when I look at you, I don't sit there picking out things that could be perceived as flaws. Because they're not flaws. They're just a part of you. And I love every part of you.” ― Lily Mayne, Moth

“I didn’t stay in New York and let David go to San Francisco because I like the Statue of Liberty. I did it because I want to climb the ladder as high as I possibly can. I did it because I want my name, the name my father gave me, in big, bold letters one day. This is my chance.” ― Taylor Jenkins Reid, The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
“Humble confidence lets your best speak for itself.” ― Carlos Wallace, Life is not Complicated, You Are

“I have a choice.Instead of worrying what others think,I realize no one else can change who I am inside.I choose to feel proud of who I am,even if I am different.Because each tree is valuable becauseit brings something unique to the world.I believe in myself.I know I am exactly as I am meant to be,like a seed who knows it is a tree,just…not…yet.” ― Lauren Martin, Insecurity is a Seed
“Looking at myself now, pulled together and slimmer, I feel a rush of confidence. I look good. I feel good.” ― Taylor Jenkins Reid, The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo

“I have a choice.Instead of worrying what others think,I realize no one else can change who I am inside.I choose to feel proud of who I am,even if I am different.Because each tree is valuable becauseit brings something unique to the world.I believe in myself.I know I am exactly as I am meant to be,like a seed who knows it is a tree,just…not…yet.” ― Lauren Martin, Insecurity is a Seed

“Back at the oak the men lounged in the shade and finished up their meal. Watching Clayt down at the creek, Nestor threw out a quiet question for anyone who would listen.“How come Clayt don’t wear no spurs?”“Don’t need ’em,” Lou said. “You seen him ride. He can purty much control a horse with just his knees and neck-reinin’.”Nestor lay back and propped on both elbows. Lifting a leg, he turned one boot in profile and spun the rowel with the toe of his other boot.“Hell, I like the way it sounds when I walk.”Lou stood and brushed off his trousers. “He don’t need that neither.” ― Mark Warren, Indigo Heaven
“Because you're ready for it." Rhys said it like it wasn't even a question. "You're a fucking queen, and don't let anyone tell you otherwise. Including yourself.” ― Ana Huang, Twisted Games

“You must know your worth and acknowledge it. When you know your worth, a man must give you every bit of what you are worth. When a man knows that a woman values herself regardless of what others do or say, he wants her and he even wants to become a better man for her.” ― Leandra De Andrade

“Mostly, what people really mean by confidence is that they are better than other people; generally, people known to them. Fortunately, we don’t need to be better than anyone else to be happy. We do, however, need to fulfil our own specific potential.” ― Donna Goddard, Dance: A Spiritual Affair
“TWO THINGS WILL TELL THE TRUTH ABOUT YOU, YOUR FEAR, AND YOUR CONFIDENCE” ― P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar
“Regrets? I'm not afraid of having regrets. I'm more afraid of not having the chance to know if I regretted it or not.” ― Mystqx Skye
“I’ve got this shit.” ― Taylor Jenkins Reid, The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
“IF NOTHING IS GOING IN YOUR WAY, GET OUT OF MY WAY” ― P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

“When we feel confident that our skills can be a contribution to others, we discover another source of internal satisfaction.” ― Stacey Hall, Selling from Your Comfort Zone: The Power of Alignment Marketing
“Two times in life you do not waste time arguing with someone: when you are wrong, and when you are right.” ― Liz Faublas, You Have a Superpower: Mindi PI Meets Bailey
“Each chapter allowed me to break my silence, gain confidence & fight for my truth” ― Kimberly Anne Bell, The Epitome of Kimmy: Accept & Embrace It All

“When we lack confidence, living life becomes more complex. However, the fear of failure most likely reduces our confidence and thus makes problem solving more difficult; when you accept failure as a learning experience, your confidence evolves.” ― RJ Intindola – (Gandolfo) – 1991

“But insecurity is like a seedthat doesn’t believe it is a tree.So I remember to feel confident,even before I succeed.I believe that I can do it,even if it hasn’t happened yet.Because every treestarted as a tiny seed,that fell to the groundand had to grow up.” ― Lauren Martin, Insecurity is a Seed

“The next time you feel insecure, remind yourself that you are exactly as you are meant to be, and you are valuable to the world because you are different and unique.” ― Lauren Martin, Insecurity is a Seed
“In reality, you don't become happy because of your appearance. Instead, you might gain confidence from it.” ― Mwanandeke Kindembo

“Dear Superwoman, Be confident and comfortable to hold another woman’s hand.Have the courage to wish her well, and it shall be well with you.” ― Gift Gugu Mona , Woman of Virtue: Power-Filled Quotes for a Powerful Woman

“Dear Superwoman,Low self-esteem often brings some women down, to the extent that they want to drag others down to their level.Do not be that kind of woman. Wear your crown of confidence and applaud other women who are doing well.Pull up those who are down.Lift them and then you will shine.” ― Gift Gugu Mona , Woman of Virtue: Power-Filled Quotes for a Powerful Woman
“Narcissists lie! When they said you weren’t good enough, it was a lie. They knew you were a better person than them, so they stole your confidence and light to feel powerful.” ― Tracy Malone
“Anyone shall be the reason behind my failure but none should be the cause behind my success, I am strong enough to be myself.” ― P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar
“Confidence comes from within, and it is built over time.” ― Dana L. Stringer
“Confidence is the unshakeable conviction that you are the source of all the solutions you need at any given time.” ― Dr. Jacinta Mpalyenkana, PhD, MBA
“No one is right and no one is perfect except you.” ― P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar
“When you lose confidence, show your dedication towards it, success will definitely come.” ― Shiva Negi
“You need to undergo a million surgeries so that they cut it out of your genes!” ― Lana M. Rochel, Kill Your Darlings: Long Poem
“You become stronger and more confident by showing the courage to change the things you have control over.” ― Germany Kent

“Success inspired confidence; confidence produced success.” ― Daniel Z. Lieberman, The Molecule of More: How a Single Chemical in Your Brain Drives Love, Sex, and Creativity—and Will Determine the Fate of the Human Race

“I can't say I have always loved myself. I can only admit that I have weaved in and out of love for myself. I have always seemed to love others sometimes more than myself, but have had a true desire to turn that love inwards.” ― Helen Edwards, Nothing Sexier Than Freedom
“Having talent is fantastic. Having confidence is even more important” ― Robin Sharma, Робин Шарма
“Masks were not made to be worn forever, they were made to be taken off to reveal who you truly are.” ― Skylar Sustin
“Being Yourself Is Being Divine” ― Shiva Negi
“CONFIDENCE IS AN UNSTOPPABLE EDUCATION” ― P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

“Having a confident expectation of success can make obstacles melt before your eyes.” ― Daniel Z. Lieberman, The Molecule of More: How a Single Chemical in Your Brain Drives Love, Sex, and Creativity—and Will Determine the Fate of the Human Race
“Be true to yourself for you came into this world alone and will leave alone.” ― Michael Dean Russell Jr.
“No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.” ― Eleanor Rooseveltanor
“No longer was she the little girl trying to be an adult. She was a grown woman, feeling ten feet tall.” ― Evangeline Duran Fuentes, Finding Erin
“People who receive compliments but never give them lack self confidence. ” ― Germany Kent
“We evolve to have better dynamics with others. Not to be liked by them.” ― Mitta Xinindlu
“Despite The Frequent Questioning Of Life, Always Be An Answer, With No Worries Of You're Right Or Wrong.” ― Mike Ssendikwanawa
“My Thoughts, Words & Actions Will Lead Me to My Goal.” ― Ujjwal Arora, Affirmations: a daily handbook
“People who lack confidence have a problem giving compliments.” ― Germany Kent

“Confidence, in turn, contributes significantly to our sense of control over our life. A sense of control is what allows us to critically examine and adjust our beliefs, hold firm to our core values, develop the right kind of attitude and display grit when we need it.” ― David Amerland, Intentional: How To Live, Love, Work and Play Meaningfully
“Patience is a child of confidence.” ― Dr. Jacinta Mpalyenkana, PhD, MBA
“You may lose a lot, but until you lose your self confidence, you have lost nothing.” ― Udai Yadla
“WHEN ENEMIES CHASE YOU DOWN, ENJOY THE VIEW FROM THE TOP” ― P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar
“Neglect the social comparison around you and be super-confident to protect yourself.” ― sophieya

“Every individual has a place to fill in the world and it paramount in some reverence whether he opts to be or not.I ken of no more emboldening fact than the incontrovertible competency of man to elevate his life by conscious endeavor. After all destiny is not a matter of chance, but of cull. Not something to optate for, but to procure.” ― Apoorv Awasthi
“Before leaders can gain the confidence of others, they must have confidence in themselves.” ― Merida Johns, Leadership Development for Healthcare: A Pathway, Process, and Workbook
“When you are relentless, bold, and confident nothing can stop you.” ― Germany Kent

“Your reading style will reveal your inner nature. The hesitant always turn the page to see what they missed on first reading, while the confident and focused minds have no time to waste.” ― Mwanandeke Kindembo

“Children will not be motivated to do needed work until we set them OBSESSED about their future and or; get them EXCITED about life and or; Give them CONFIDENCE to lead others and or; INSPIRE them to forget their troubles and do well in spite of them.” ― Asuni LadyZeal

“I believe the root of self-confidence is primal.I believe it comes from the ability to standamong men without the fear of aggressionfrom any of them. This ability exists in all human beings; find and develop it.” ― John Corley
“Confidence? Some of the most destructive things in the world are done with utter confidence.” ― Donna Goddard, Purnima

“Always remember people with limitations will attempt to put their limitations on you.People who operate on a positive, encouraging, inclusive level within their own life will never tell you that you are not good enough.” ― Eileen Anglin

“Confidence is the one quality you must master to increase your allure. And it all depends on how you think about yourself.” ― Leandra De Andrade, This Girl's Got Game: A Smart Girls Guide to Having the Upper Hand over Men in This Game Called Love
“Confidence is similar luck. You can't hold it forever at your service!” ― Mwanandeke Kindembo
“Confidence is similar to luck. You can't hold it forever at your service!” ― Mwanandeke Kindembo

“If you feel that you lack self-confidence, fake it until you make it. You might just find out that it is easier to have than you had thought or felt it was. Everyone is entitled to the feeling of self-confidence. Each of us is entitled to the feeling that we are worthy. Say this to yourself every day and be confident in yourself.” ― Michael G Sawaya

“It might feel to you like a big waste of time chatting on texts endlessly and going on video dates that never end. But here is the thing...how much time did you waste going on endless, meaningless dates only to lead you down a path of disappointment?” ― Kimmy Seltzer
“Stand in front of a mirror, and you will see the source of great potentials this world is yet to see.” ― Wayne Chirisa

“Dressing well is not about fashion or vanity. It’s about self-expression, self-acceptance, self-love, and teaching others how to treat you.” ― Michele Gustafson, Show Up Confident: The New Way To Get Ready For Your Day And Your Life
“always do what you believe to be right, even if others mock or criticize you about it” ― Anath Lee Wales, your life can be changed.: the true guide to become a change maker!

“Do not look at the size of your mountain but look at what faith can do with such a challenge in front of you. Believing in yourself is where it starts. Don’t wait on others to affirm you. It starts with you and ends with you. You need help along the way for sure, but you may be climbing to the top solo on most days. That’s okay. Mr. Faith and Mrs. Confidence is along for the ride and they make dud’s into studs.” ― Chris J. Gregas
“You doubt your value. Don't run from who you are.” ― C.S Lewis
“I reach out to touch her, the goddess beholding me. "Thank you for coming." I shout with gratitude. "Now let's go create a night to remember!” ― Helen Edwards, Nothing Sexier Than Freedom

“Accept yourself. Accept yourself with confidence. Accept yourself with confidence and courage. Do this and you are destined to be a leader or a pioneer.” ― Lawren Leo, Horse Magick: Spells and Rituals for Self-Empowerment, Protection, and Prosperity
“Society may tell you what you should do, but you will know what is the right to do for your own happiness.” ― Trish Lee

“I run a finance business based on relationships, open communication and simplicity. Not words you naturally associate with the industry! The thing is, when I started Sapphire Lending I knew it had to be on my terms. I knew that was the only way I would stay engaged and succeed, and therefore I had the confidence to do it my way. Having this level of self-awareness helps when you set up a business and quite often it can help you find that unique selling point.” ― Sheila Holt, Trust is the New Currency: How to build trust, attract the right partners and create wealth through business and investments
“A true confidence is in distinguishing the real success and a real confidence is in extinguishing the true failure” ― P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar
“You will sparkle like a diamond if you shine in total dark.” ― Rajesh Walecha
“Confidence is self-love in action.” ― Michele Gustafson, Show Up Confident: The New Way To Get Ready For Your Day And Your Life
“The intention of your dressing becomes the intention of your day.” ― Michele Gustafson, Show Up Confident: The New Way To Get Ready For Your Day And Your Life
“Clarity creates freedom.” ― Michele Gustafson, Show Up Confident: The New Way To Get Ready For Your Day And Your Life
“Confidence comes from finishing.” ― Michele Gustafson, Show Up Confident: The New Way To Get Ready For Your Day And Your Life
“Legacy lives in those you’ve changed.” ― Michele Gustafson, Show Up Confident: The New Way To Get Ready For Your Day And Your Life
“Not everyone will have the capacity to support your growth.” ― Michele Gustafson
“You are being prepared for a success you can't yet see.” ― Michele Gustafson, Show Up Confident: The New Way To Get Ready For Your Day And Your Life
“When the world is loud, create your own peace.” ― Michele Gustafson, Show Up Confident: The New Way To Get Ready For Your Day And Your Life
“Connect with those who see your light and celebrate your flame.” ― Michele Gustafson, Show Up Confident: The New Way To Get Ready For Your Day And Your Life
“In tears there's truth.” ― Michele Gustafson, Show Up Confident: The New Way To Get Ready For Your Day And Your Life
“don't be afraid of struggles, because as you go on, it enhances your confidence” ― Anath Lee Wales, your life can be changed.: the true guide to become a change maker!
“Confidence is knowing that your cup of coffee is getting prepared somewhere & at the right time it will be served "Hot" !” ― Riya Joseph Kaithavanathara

“Limiting beliefs will always keep you behind the eight ball and surely keep you from getting to the next level in your business. It isn’t about hard work, or capabilities or opportunities as much as it is what story you tell yourself about YOU and about those in your path.” ― Chris J. Gregas

“Laziness and average are not the pedigree of an overcoming business specialist. You will be counting pennies for a long time as long as you are interested in BIG before you put great effort into SMALL, but MEANINGFUL steps. Make it your aim today to be a “champion” in the making. You are not going to be hoisted up on the podium this afternoon, but inch by inch, small but meaningful decision multiplied will get you to where you want to be and beyond. Don’t you dare despise small beginnings.” ― Chris J. Gregas
“There's no such thing as lack of confidence. It is the lack of experience that dominates your thoughts.” ― Anoir Ou-Chad
“A real confidence is born from a fragile heart and a stubborn head” ― P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar
“If someone asks you to wait, it does not mean he is not confident about you, it means he is not confident about him” ― P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar
“Don't cower before the crowd; your purpose is not to be popular nor be applauded by the masses.” ― Bernard Kelvin Clive
“The quickest way to make others doubt you is to doubt yourself.” ― Emilyann Allen (pseudonyms Emilyann Phoenix and Emilyann Girdner)
“Saying you are "the best" does not mean you are better than others. You simply believe you are the best at what YOU do.” ― Carlos Wallace
“Never limit yourself - do it all.” ― Emilyann Allen (pseudonyms Emilyann Phoenix and Emilyann Girdner)
“Let go of your inhibitions. You're capable of everything you're willing to believe you're capable of!” ― Emilyann Allen (pseudonyms Emilyann Phoenix and Emilyann Girdner)
“Acquaintance improves confidence.” ― Junaid Raza
“Knowledge enhances self-confidence.” ― Junaid Raza

“A tied tongue or a nervous silence reflects two things – Intimidation by someone’s presence or lack of belief in what we are about to say. But often we forget that the only point of judgement is the confidence, and unsaid words or undone deeds reflect lack of it” ― Shahenshah Hafeez Khan

“The Ringmaster's tool for controlling the lion is his confidence.The lion never performs because the ring master is more powerful, the lion performs because the ring master is skilled enough to be trusted.” ― Shahenshah Hafeez Khan
“Stay confident always and this will make life easier for you!” ― Avijeet Das
“Become a self-determined person on the move.” ― Germany Kent
“Someone once told me I was arrogant, self-centered, and overconfident. Well yes, and I have some bad traits too!” ― Don Rittner
“I can’t stand anyone more righteous than myself.” ― Don Rittner
“You may have been everywhere in this world... but never in mine.” ― Mystqx Skye
“For what reason you lost your patience over me, I am a giant superstar for the same reason, what else you have to lose over me right now, don't lose your life” ― P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar
“Comparing ourselves to others always results in a feeling of not good good enough. Get out of that game!” ― Nadina Boun, 21 Ways To Boost Your Confidence
“Once I decided, then there is no path to drop” ― Aabas Sadkani
“In my life, every second, every minute and every day has been engraved by me” ― P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar
“once decided, then there's no path to drop” ― Aabas Sadkani
“Your background will not pin you back to the ground for you are destined for greatness.” ― Tshikororo Mashuduroro
“The strength to persevere is fueled by absolute faith.” ― Wayne Chirisa
“A real confidence is born from a fragile heart with a stubborn head” ― P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar
“Keep Confidence!! Life emerges as a clear stream when you face the ripples with determination.” ― Aishwarya Sridhar
“A confident woman can never be threatened by another confident woman around her.” ― Gift Gugu Mona, Woman of Virtue: Power-Filled Quotes for a Powerful Woman
“A confident woman may not be rich, but deep within, she is enriched with a better understanding of who she is.” ― Gift Gugu Mona, Woman of Virtue: Power-Filled Quotes for a Powerful Woman
“A caring woman cares about others. She is full of love and she is someone you can rely on.” ― Gift Gugu Mona, Woman of Virtue: Power-Filled Quotes for a Powerful Woman

“Dear Superwoman, just because the woman next door has a different accent from yours, it does not mean they have a better access to acumen than you do. Be confident!” ― Gift Gugu Mona, Woman of Virtue: Power-Filled Quotes for a Powerful Woman
“Make space for the next new version of you - so your transformation can be your biggest out come” ― Shaneika Marie
“If you know where you are from, it is harder for people to stop you where you are going.” ― Matshona Dhliwayo
“Your worth is not what you wear, but what you do.” ― Matshona Dhliwayo
“If you are going to believe in anyone, believe in yourself.” ― Matshona Dhliwayo

“It’s unfortunate that inflated self-worth is being mistaken for confidence when it’s really an indication of the opposite. True confidence is reflected through humility, vulnerability and kindness. It’s quiet. It’s subtle. It does not overwhelm. It does not shrink others down to elevate oneself and it doesn’t not knock others down to give the illusion of being above.” ― Jacqueline Simon Gunn
“The most valuable asset in your life is your self-worth, not your net worth.” ― Matshona Dhliwayo

“When others attempt to undermine you, let them know that the jig’s up and you’re not having it. Keep your dreams sacred from those who are unable to support your vision.” ― Penelope Jean Hayes, The Magic of Viral Energy: An Ancient Key to Happiness, Empowerment, and Purpose
“Even your own shadow does not stand for you in dark times, you have to stand for you” ― Dr.P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar
“Believing you can climb any mountain with your feet is confidence; Believing you can climb every mountain with barefoot is over-confidence” ― Dr.P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar
“If you doubt you can accomplish something, then you can't accomplish it. You have to have confidence in your ability, and then be tough enough to follow through.” ― Carlos Wallace
“If you know where you are from, it will be harder for people to stop you where you are going.” ― Matshona Dhliwayo
“Our boundaries define our personal space - and we need to be sovereign there in order to be able to step into our full power and potential.” ― Jessica Moore
“Never feel inferior to what God has said you are superior to.” ― Matshona Dhliwayo

“Thirty is a few glasses of Chianti in a sunflower dress. Handpicked San Marzano tomatoes stewing while the breeze invites itself in. Freshly rolled bucatini against candlelit linen.” ― Kristy Ferretti

“Most people think that sensuality is just a term reserved for bikini models, erotic novels and sex related businesses. But truth is, sensuality is there mainly to serve as a TOOL to developing one’s CONFIDENCE for both personal and professional success.” ― Lebo Grand
“Believe in me because I believe in you.” ― Matshona Dhliwayo

“Four Steps to Combat Bullying1. BE CONFIDENT. Never lose sight of the fact that God made you in His image, therefore you are amazing. You see greatness and promise in the mirror every morning. Go out into the world with your head held high and armed with self-assurance. Bullies target weakness. Your confidence disarms them. 2. SET BOUNDARIES. There is a line no one should cross, including you. Distance yourself from hostile environments and situations and avoid conflict at all cost. There is never a need for unnecessary confrontation. It will never be worth it. If you don’t give a bully an opportunity you diminish their power.3. ARM YOURSELF WITH INTELLIGENCE. Be the smartest in the class and among your friends. Be a leader in your community and the superior athlete. Be the light. Build such a reputation of greatness, you become the blueprint everyone wants to follow. Bullies fear anyone smarter and more popular than they are, because they know that they can’t compete. 4. PROTECT YOUR ENERGY. Pay attention to the people who laugh when others make you the butt of the joke. Note the ones who do not cheer you on when you win. Be aware of the person(s) fueling the negativity, egging the bullies on, creating discord. Those people are not your friends.” ― Carlos Wallace

“Your confidence, your endurance, the vitality you require to live your life, the very essence of your life itself and your chi, or life energy, are stored in your breath.” ― Catherine Carrigan, The Little Book of Breathwork
“Sitting around waiting for validation from others before I take action is not something I'm interested in anymore.” ― Heather Monahan, Confidence Creator
“The safest bet you can ever make is on yourself, the smartest, is on God.” ― Matshona Dhliwayo
“Boundaries and sensitivity are directly connected.” ― Jessica Moore
“Bet on yourself before you bet on the world.” ― Matshona Dhliwayo
“Strength of character is her best asset... and she wears it like a crown.” ― Mystqx
“Love who you are, not who you are not.” ― Matshona Dhliwayo
“Love who you are, not who the world says you are not.” ― Matshona Dhliwayo
“Confidence has to be backed up with competence.” ― Loren Weisman
“Confidence can't hide.” ― Julieanne O'Connor
